name: Same Soul
description:
A darkness approaches these grassy lands as evil reigns. Zarrix, the wizard has created a seam between worlds, shifting their realities and creating a land of endless terror.

You play as Arthas and Bantry, a paladin and a hunter from distant worlds, intertwined by this unusual meeting. You must make use of your unique abilities and work in unison to conquer these deadly foes. After all... you share the same soul.
